item.title: Wolf scaper's quest making guide :)
item.dc:creator: @armadyl_slayer armadyl slayer
item.description:
@armadyl_slayer wrote:

yes…my allias is wolf scaper…

i recently noticed alot of quest requests…so i decided to put together a little project…

instead of me doing the work for you here is the brainstorm page…

my server has quest books depending on (level) and member or not

to get this started you need to be a good java coder

first thing you need to do is this…

get a item that is a book’s id code…

make a send quest uery such as…

questBook easy {

       quest book (easy) //title

       sendQuest(128) welcome to my server's quest log :) 6533;
       sendQuest(128) 6534;
       sendQuest(128) there are many quest books out there... 6535;
       sendQuest(128) 6536;
       sendQuest(128) first use this book on any npc thats talkable :) 6537;
       sendQuest(128) 6538;
       sendQuest(128) the npc will give you a quest book with 1 quest 6539;
       sendQuest(128) 6540;
       sendQuest(128) read the quest then do what it says... 6541;
       sendQuest(128) 6542;
       sendQuest(128) then do the tasks then return to the npc when finished 6543;
       sendQuest(128) 6544;
       sendQuest(128) he will then reward you with your prize! 6545;
       sendQuest(128) 6546;
       sendQuest(128) good luck and enjoy! 6547;
       sendQuest(128) 6548;
       sendQuest(128) 6549;
       sendQuest(128) 6550;
       sendQuest(128) 6551;
       sendQuest(128) -wolf scaper 6552;
public void sendMenue;
sendMenue = true;
wordsOnMenue = true;
closeMenue = false;
} else {
actionButton5 = true;
close = true;

well theres the main book menue reply if you want more

no rep needed im just here to gain info and share

-wolf scaper

Read full topic
